TopicTitle: NASA ARES Mars Aeroplane KSP Demonstration

Articles.Content:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H_FY6HDg_eg

The ARES unmanned plane is in planning for Mars, and it will fly like shown in the video, using liquid fuel and oxidizer in inline engines. Nobody really knows about the project yet, so I thought I would share it with you. This video is flying it near the KSC. I will make a video soon with it being launched, the aeroshell being deployed and entering the atmosphere of Duna, and unfolding with Damned Robotics.

Hope you like it
